Audioform's 'RITUAL' Is Back This Saturday & It’s Time to Celebrate!

Posted by Brittany Prevost on October 7, 2022

This Saturday, October 8th, 2022, Audioform's 'RITUAL' is back at The 27 Club for another highly-anticipated edition. To add to the excitement, participants will be treated to several extra special surprises; and it just so happens that we have that inside scoop to share with our Flag fam...

In true Audioform fashion, the team has expertly curated a lineup which includes skilled artists from Ottawa and its surrounding area. This month's bill comprises the likes of PAQS, MEEB REEZY, MOTION SICKNESS, EXST, and DROP DOCTOR.

If you happen to have caught our recent exclusive interview with PAQS, or his dynamic set at Festival Riverside last month, you know this Canadian talent is ready to deliver a high-energy performance, guaranteed to leave even the toughest of critics in awe. Word is, he's about to kick it up a notch even further...

Aside from PAQS, we're personally looking forward to catching EXST's set. This up-and-coming DJ/producer has been making a name for himself thanks to his noteworthy productions, especially in collaboration with the PMP Records bass house/tech house/DnB label. We have no doubts that he'll deliver a killer set!

Although PAQS and EXST are gearing up to unleash their distinct sounds and preparing their sets, the remaining acts are ready to match their efforts as well as celebrate their birthdays during this long-awaited event. If history repeats itself, we can guarantee that extra celebrations will be worth making the venture!

In addition to taking a moment to recognize another year around the sun for these particular musicians and their performances, arguably the most much-anticipated moment of the event will be DROP DOCTOR's debut. As some of you may know, this artist is actually Audioform's owner...

This premiere performance is already extraordinary due to the fact that it will be the first (and potentially the last) of its kind. That said, we've heard through the grapevine that a surprise is in store - one that involves a live instrument! Trust us, you won't want to miss it. Grab your tickets here. See you tomorrow!
